Package edu.sru.cpsc.webshopping.controller.purchase

Class TransactionDetailsPageController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.cpsc.webshopping.controller.purchase.TransactionDetailsPageController
@Controller public class TransactionDetailsPageController extends Object
Manages the transactionDetails page This is used for viewing information about a particular transaction, and for allowing shipping information to be added by the seller
